definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:isWater</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:isWater</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="block_remove"><value name="x"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">blockX</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">blockY</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">blockZ</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
